SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Interface VirtualView

All Superinterfaces:
HeartBeatListener, Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Client, ClientRMI, ClientSocket
public interface VirtualView extends HeartBeatListener, Remote
This class defines a "virtual client" and represents the means by which the client interacts with the server. Follows the observer design pattern.

    • showUpdatePlayerStatus

      void showUpdatePlayerStatus(boolean isConnected, String username) throws RemoteException
      Method used to show basic player information. It notifies about the player disconnections, and also when a new player connects.
      Parameters:
      isConnected - player status.
      username - of the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in the event of an error occurring during the execution of a remote method.

    • showUpdateColor

      void showUpdateColor(PlayerColor color, String username) throws RemoteException
      Method used to show the chosen color. All clients receive the information, the ones that aren't the username, will remove color from their list of available colors.
      Parameters:
      color - the color chosen by the player.
      username - the username of the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in the event of an error occurring during the execution of a remote method.

    • showUpdateObjectiveCard

      void showUpdateObjectiveCard(ClientObjectiveCard chosenObjective, String username) throws RemoteException
      Method used to show the objective card.
      Parameters:
      chosenObjective - the chosen objective.
      username - of the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in the event of an error occurring during the execution of a remote method.

    • showUpdateAfterPlace

      void showUpdateAfterPlace(Map<Position,CornerPosition> positionToCornerCovered, List<Position> newAvailablePositions, Map<Symbol,Integer> newResources, int points, String username, ClientCard placedCard, Side placedSide, Position position) throws RemoteException
      Method used to show updated information after a place. The two list positions and tiles represent every new available tile added after the last place invocation symbols and total amount represents the new resources added after the last place invocation consider both couples like maps.
      Parameters:
      positionToCornerCovered - a map with the covered corners.
      newAvailablePositions - a list with every new available tile added after the last placement.
      newResources - the new resources added after the last placement.
      points - the points present after the placement.
      username - the username of the player.
      placedCard - the card that has been placed.
      placedSide - the side of the card that has been placed.
      position - the position of the card in the playground.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in the event of an error occurring during the execution of a remote method.

    • showUpdateAfterDraw

      void showUpdateAfterDraw(ClientCard drawnCard, ClientFace newTopDeck, ClientCard newFaceUpCard, String username, int boardPosition) throws RemoteException
      Method used to notify the update after a draw.
      Parameters:
      drawnCard - the drawn card.
      newTopDeck - the new card that replaces the previous card that was present in the deck.
      newFaceUpCard - the new face up card that replaces the previous one.
      username - the username of the player who performs the drawing.
      boardPosition - from which the card was selected, 4 for golden deck, 5 for resource deck and 0,1,2 or 3 for face up cards.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in the event of an error occurring during the execution of a remote method.

      Parameters:

    • resultOfLogin

      void resultOfLogin(boolean accepted, String username, String details) throws RemoteException
      Method used to connect the player or an output with the details, depending on whether the player is accepted or not.
      Parameters:
      accepted - boolean indicating whether the player is accepted or not.
      username - the player's username.
      details - the error details.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in the event of an error occurring during the execution of a remote method.
